definitions.body: :Ezr 2:64 ten thousand myriad (later (Aramaizing) synonym of foregoing; perh. for Aram. ([[ת]])[[רִבּוּ]], Kö:ii. 1:221 f., but Palm. [[רבו]] Lzb:367);—abs. [[רִבּוֹ]] 1Ch 29:7, 1Ch 29:7, Jon 4:11 (? Cstr.), + cstr. Ho 8:12 Kt (v. infr.); [[רִבּוֹא]] Ezr 2:64 = Ne 7:66, Ne 7:71 (van d. H. v:72), du [[רִבּׂתַיִם]] Ps 68:18; pl. [[רִבּוֹת]] Ne 7:70 (van d. H. v:17), [[רִבּׂאוֹת]] Ezr 2:69, Da 11:12;—ten thousand; of pers., 4*10,000+200+3*100+60 Ezr 2:64 = Ne 7:66; 12*10,000+n. Jon 4:11; indef. Da 11:12 he shall cast down myriads; rd. [[רִבּוֹת]] also v:41 (for MT [[רַבּוֹת]]) Kmp Bev Behrm Marti Prince; of things, esp. units of value, n. + 10, 00 1Ch 29:7, n.+6*10,000+ 1000 Ezr 2:69 ‖ n. + 2*10000 Ne 7:70, Ne 7:71 (v. supr.); 10,000+8*1000+n. 1Ch 29:7; indef. [[רֶכֶב אֱלֽתִים רִבּׂתַיִם]] Ps 68:18 (‖[[אלפים ]]); —[[רִבּוֹ]] [[תוֹרָתִי]] Ho 8:12 (Kt 10, 00[precepts] of my instruction would be only early instance, v. [[רׂב]].
